question:
(@problem 1)
;; Write a function that consumes two numbers and produces the larger
;; of the two.  
(define (larger x y)
(if (> x y)
    x
    y))
can some explain to me how this function came out, IDK how to do this question
instructor_answer: What happens if you use the stepper to step a call to the function?
